tool_description: Calculates patient risk scores for various conditions based on clinical factors, demographics, and established risk assessment tools.

suspected_conditions.description: Conditions for which to calculate risk

risk_factors.description: Identified risk factors for the patient

risk_calculator_type.description: Risk calculator type: clinical, validated-score, composite

error_messages: Missing required data: Provide suspected conditions, age, gender, and risk factors.
Invalid demographics: Age must be 0-150, gender must be male/female/other.
Empty conditions list: Provide at least one suspected condition for risk assessment.
Invalid calculator type: Use clinical, validated-score, or composite.
Insufficient data for risk calculation: Some conditions require specific clinical parameters.
Risk calculation failed: Unable to compute risk scores with provided data.
usage: Provide suspected conditions, patient demographics, risk factors, and clinical data. The tool calculates risk stratification scores using appropriate clinical risk assessment methods.

risk_scores.description: Numerical risk scores for each suspected condition

risk_categories.description: Risk categories: low, moderate, high, very-high

contributing_factors.description: Main factors contributing to risk elevation
